However, following civil unrest, a large group of warriors, waterbenders, and healers journeyed to the South Pole to engender a new tribal confederation of several autonomous chiefdoms. The Southern Tribesmen eventually agreed to reaccept the Northern ${link_0} as their ruler, as long they were granted autonomy and their own government for internal affairs. Over time, Southerners married into the ruling family of the North, strengthening the tribal ties.
